title: Dan sings for his supper... er, breakfast
body: Another boring set of pictures of me talking into a camera. What I won't do for publicity! The following photos were taken during at our 7:30 AM interview last Tuesday. This is the last time you'll see me with my hands in my pockets. This is strange, because for every picture after this one my hands are clasped gently in front of my crotch. Yet, when you watch the video, you'll see my arms flailing violently in all directions. I'm a fluent gesticulator. I'm hitting a C note here. Just warming up really. This is the face I make when someone tells me I can't sing. Here's a picture of the reporter and I holding hands as we tiptoe through the debris. Nicole was livid! There's no getting around it... everyone's gotta see the bank vault. This picture was taken the morning after the interview when we had to be at the theater at 5:30 in the AM. I'm sleeping with my eyes open. During the live feed, Rachel (the reporter) sat down in our sample chair and it tipped over. She caught herself just in the nick of time, but it's still pretty funny.
author: Dan

comments.author: Aaron
comments.body: You still haven't unpacked your clothes, have you?

comments.author: bjork24
comments.body: No, we haven't, but if you look closely you'll notice that I'm wearing a different shirt on each subsequent day. The jacket never changes. It's sewn on to my neck.
